nodes.text: Star Wars: The Original Topps Trading Card Series, Volume One

Star Wars: The Original Topps Trading Card Series, Volume One is a hardcover art book from Abrams. The book reprints in its entirety the original 1977–1978 Topps Star Wars trading card series, including the fronts and backs of all 330 cards and fifty-five stickers, as well as four bonus cards, from the series' five sets. Original Star Wars Topps editor Gary Gerani provides commentary and the book's introduction, while collector Robert V. Conte contributes a special afterword regarding the rare Star Wars Wonder Bread trading cards. The book was released on November 17, 2015.

It is the first book in its series, which also includes Star Wars: The Empire Strikes Back: The Original Topps Trading Card Series, Volume Two and Star Wars: Return of the Jedi: The Original Topps Trading Card Series, Volume Three.
